resources.string: Map Icons: Maps Icon Collection https://mapicons.mapsmarker.com
You can use this map for finding the locations of car parks and bicycle stations in Cork city, how full a car park is, or how many bicycles and stands are available at each bicycle station.

This map of Cork City features prominent car parks and bicycle stations around the main city area and provides information about them.

For car parks you can find the amount of free parking spaces, cost to park there, and opening hours. 
For bicycle stations, you can find how many bikes or bike stands are available.

Time indicates when the information was last updated, and is refreshed when app is re-opened.
Controls: Pinch the map to zoom in/out and twist to rotate. The map\'s orientation can be reset by tapping the compass icon that appears in the top right.
- Indicates a cluster of markers. The number represents how many markers are in that area.
Map: © Mapbox, © OpenStreetMap contributors\n\nDesign based off the Cork Dashboard http://www.corkdashboard.ie
